sections.MISSION: A TROOP, 1/2 CR conducts M17 Qualification on 04 OCT 23 on Range 202 IOT train and qualify Soldiers on the M17 weapon system.
sections.PURPOSE: – In order to produce Soldiers that are qualified on the M17 weapon system.
sections.KEY TASKS:
–
Train Lethal Soldiers
Build Confidence in assigned weapon system
Soldiers receiver an opportunity to qualify at night.
sections.END STATE:
– All of the Troop’s Soldiers qualified on M17 weapon system, improving TRP/SQDN lethality. Troop Commander and Platoon Leaders are presented with list of qualified soldiers.
3.
sections.EXECUTION:
PLTs will conduct round-robin Tables I-III days prior to range.
On day of range troop moves to RG 202 assembles in AA.Firers move dismounted to holding area at RG 202, receive range and safety brief, receive ammo at 202.
Tables VI will be conducted 4 OCT23.
We will make the transition to Table VI when appropriate.
C I – AMA, Water Internal to PLT.
C IV – Sandbags through Range Control.
C V – Ammunition coordinated by XO.
Task to Subordinate Units-
HQ – Provide overall C2 support and Coordinate field rations.
1st PLT – 10x Safeties, Table I-III,6x fire/range detail,1x OIC, 1xRSO, 1xRTO, 1x Ammo NCO, 2x Soldiers for ammo detail, Medical Support, 2x Gate Guards
2nd PLT - 3x Instructors, Table I-III, (Platoon Internal)
3rd PLT – 3xInstructors,Table I-III, (Platoon Internal)
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
-
All events will be completed in full Dragoon Standard
Platoons will coordinate their own transportation to the range.
Ensure Soldiers are utilizing the concurrent training that will be explained in the range orientation
4.
